data.comment: The match has started, with Barnsley kicking-off.
Mads Andersen for Barnsley has been booked by Tim Robinson and receives a first yellow card.
In the minute 42, Michal Helik (Barnsley) has been sent off!
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Marcel Ritzmaier (Barnsley) has received a yellow card from Tim Robinson.
In the minute 46, The second half is underway in Reading - Reading with the kick-off.
Callum Styles is on a sub for Luke Thomas for Barnsley.
Reading's Josh Laurent has been booked in Reading.
In the minute 59, Reading make their first substitution with Yakou Meite replacing Josh Laurent.
Patrick Schmidt is replacing Dominik Frieser for the away team.
Reading move into a 1-0 lead through a Yakou Meite header.
In the minute 68, Mads Andersen (Barnsley) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
The away team replace Conor Chaplin with Aapo Halme.
Alex Mowatt (Barnsley) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 76, Reading take a comfortable 2-0 lead thanks to Michael Olise.
George Puscas is on a sub for Lucas Joao for Reading.
Sone Aluko is replacing John Swift for Reading at Madejski Stadium.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 2-0.
